oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-07-18 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 18, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performer Eddy Arnold with Harold Bradley on guitar and Marvin Hughes on piano (as per Mr. Bradley 2006-08-14), and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1032nd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Faron Young; Eddy Arnold; Grandpa Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Eddy Arnold) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Faron Young) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Eddy Arnold -- Anytime (Eddy Arnold) -- Grant Turner introduces Grandpa Jones -- Don't Bring Your Banjo Home (Grandpa Jones) -- Grant Turner and Faron Young announce his tour schedule -- Country Girl (Faron Young) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Faron Young) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Jackson, Tommy; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Young, Faron; Bradley, Harold (Guitarist); Hughes, Marvin; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008
